capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid in person, and I have to say, he does look pretty tall for a gamekeeper. The way he moves with such ease, it's almost like he's gliding across the ground. I'm not surprised at all that people find him surprisingly-tall, actually.
I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's really towering over the rest of the students at Hogwarts. Hagrid looks surprisingly tall.
capsules_submitted.reply: i know. valeria told me that hagrid is quite tall.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it turns out that his lineage is quite interesting. It's not exactly a pleasant topic to discuss, but I think it's worth knowing if you're interested in learning more about Dudley's health.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry and he's looking a bit flushed. He has that red hair, you know? It really stands out when he's upset or excited. Anyway, I think he's fine now, but I'm glad I got to see him before things escalated.
